com.almasb.fxgl.ui

Class FXGLMenu

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.almasb.fxgl.ui.FXGLScene
      • com.almasb.fxgl.ui.FXGLMenu
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    CCTRGameMenu, CCTRMainMenu, FXGLCommonMenu, GTAVGameMenu, GTAVMainMenu

    public abstract class FXGLMenu
extends FXGLScene
    This is a base class for main/game menus. It provides several convenience methods for those who just want to extend an existing menu. It also allows for implementors to build menus from scratch. Freshly build menus can interact with FXGL by calling fire* methods.
    Author:
    Almas Baimagambetov (AlmasB) (almaslvl@gmail.com)

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      protected class  FXGLMenu.MenuContent
      A generic vertical box container for menu content where each element is followed by a separator

    • Method Detail

      • createContentLoad

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentLoad()
        Returns:
        menu content containing list of save files and load/delete buttons

      • createContentControls

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentControls()
        Returns:
        menu content containing input mappings (action -> key/mouse)

      • createContentVideo

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentVideo()
        Returns:
        menu content with video settings

      • createContentAudio

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentAudio()
        Returns:
        menu content containing music and sound volume sliders

      • addCredit

        protected final void addCredit(String text)
        Add a single line of credit text.
        Parameters:
        text - the text to append to credits list

      • createContentCredits

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentCredits()
        Returns:
        menu content containing a list of credits

      • createContentAchievements

        protected final FXGLMenu.MenuContent createContentAchievements()
        Returns:
        menu content containing a list of achievements

      • addUINode

        protected final void addUINode(javafx.scene.Node node)
        Adds a UI node.
        Parameters:
        node - the node to add

      • fireNewGame

        protected final void fireNewGame()
        Fires MenuEvent.NEW_GAME event. Can only be fired from main menu. Starts new game.

      • fireContinue

        protected final void fireContinue()
        Fires MenuEvent.LOAD event. Lads the game state from last modified save file.

      • fireLoad

        protected final void fireLoad(String fileName)
        Fires MenuEvent.LOAD event. Loads the game state from previously saved file.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the saved file

      • fireSave

        protected final void fireSave(String fileName)
        Fires MenuEvent.SAVE event. Can only be fired from game menu. Saves current state of the game with given file name.
        Parameters:
        fileName - name of the save file

      • fireResume

        protected final void fireResume()
        Fires MenuEvent.RESUME event. Can only be fired from game menu. Will close the menu and unpause the game.

      • fireExit

        protected final void fireExit()
        Fire MenuEvent.EXIT event. If fired from game menu, app will clean up and enter main menu. If fired from main menu, app will close.
